mapper.select: SELECT item_index, item_seller, item_title, item_content, item_category, item_price, item_place, item_place_address, item_placeX, item_placeY, item_status, TO_CHAR(item_enrolldate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS item_enrolldate, item_click, item_interest, item_offdate, item_buyer, show_thumb, show_img1, show_img2, show_img3, show_img4, show_img5 FROM item i JOIN showcase s ON s.show_item = i.item_index WHERE item_index = #{item_index}
mapper.insert: insert into reply(repl_index, repl_item, repl_candidate,repl_nickname, repl_content, repl_enrolldate) values(REPLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{repl_item}, #{repl_candidate},#{repl_nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repl_content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM reply left join account on repl_candidate=acc_index WHERE repl_item = #{item_index} order by repl_index desc
mapper.update: UPDATE item SET item_click = item_click + 1 WHERE item_index = #{itemId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from interest where int_item = #{item_index}
mapper.update: update ITEM set item_status='onsale' where item_index=#{itemNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT i.*, s.show_thumb, s.show_img1, s.show_img2, s.show_img3, s.show_img4, s.show_img5 FROM ( SELECT item.*, COUNT(repl_index) repl_count FROM item LEFT JOIN reply ON repl_item = item_index GROUP BY item_index, item_seller, item_title, item_content, item_category, item_price, item_place, item_place_address, item_placeX, item_placeY, item_status, item_enrolldate, item_click, item_interest, item_offdate, item_buyer ) i LEFT JOIN showcase s ON s.show_item = i.item_index WHERE item_status IN ('onsale', 'ondeal') ORDER BY item_index DESC, item_enrolldate DESC ) WHERE item_seller = #{item_seller} AND item_status IN ('onsale', 'ondeal') AND NOT item_index = #{item_index}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM INTEREST WHERE int_item = #{item_index} AND int_subject =#{acc_index}
